AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.marked border patrol sedan: United States Border Patrol vehicle used by agents Stanley Pruszenski and Alfred Baron for surveillance and arrest
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck camper: Vehicle used in the transportation of undocumented aliens on Interstate Highway 35, containing a camper compartment with occupants, stopped near Moore, Texas. Exhibited heavily loaded appearance with a camper attachment. Often used to transport illegal aliens, with windows that appeared fogged suggesting living cargo. Described as being overloaded and weaving due to its heavy load. Had squashed tires, angled headlights, and was driven at slow speed.
